name: Choices for Children
description: Subsidized child care for income-eligible families
fullDescription: Choices for Children provides subsidized childcare services to income-eligible families in Santa Clara County, helping parents work or attend school while their children receive quality care.
whatTheyOffer:
- Subsidized child care services
- For income-eligible families
- Multiple childcare options
- Quality care for children
- Supports working parents
- Help with childcare costs
howToGetIt:
1. Check income eligibility requirements
2. Contact Choices for Children
3. Complete application process
4. Provide income documentation
5. Choose approved childcare provider
6. Receive subsidy based on funding
address: 111 W. St. John Street, Suite 1100, San Jose, CA 95113
keywords: Choices for Children, childcare subsidy, Santa Clara, daycare, San Jose, low-income, childcare assistance
